Enumeration Type Documentation

enum XFCFILEFINDFLAGS
 

Flags for file finding.

Enumeration values:
XFCFF_DISK  Find files on disk.
XFCFF_CFL  Find files inside CFLs.
XFCFF_REMOVEDUPLICATES  Remove duplicates (if file exists both on disk and inside CFL).
XFCFF_IGNORECASE  Ignore case while searching.
